articles.title: World record Qantas rescue flight departed with empty seats
articles.description: Qantas broke an aviation record when it flew stranded Australians home from Argentina - but just 107 passengers boarded a plane with a reported capacity of 236. Follow updates here.
articles.content:
51 mins ago – 1.43AM
Michael Read
It was branded the world’s longest flight, but Qantas’ record-breaking repatriation trip from Buenos Aires departed with empty seats, stranding Australians in South America who accused the flag carrier of a marketing... [898 chars]

articles.content:
PREMIER LEAGUE clubs have been dealt a major blow after Brazil joined Argentina in denying requests to release their players early.

articles.title: Watch: Two stranded humpback whales saved after hours-long rescue operation in Argentina
articles.description: The rescue operation for this whale began on the morning of 5 October.
articles.content:
The rescue operation for this whale began on the morning of 5 October.

articles.title: Fever Dream review - a beautiful and bonkers future cult classic
articles.description: Director Claudia Llosa returns to form with a woozy work about a cosy domesticity in rural Argentina shattered by uncanny intruders
articles.content: After making high-arthouse awards-magnet The Milk of Sorrow in her native Peru in 2009, director Claudia Llosa stumbled in 2014 with her first English-language feature, Aloft which, despite its title, failed to take flight. And while seven years isn’... [2306 chars]

articles.title: Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni supports biennial World Cup proposal
articles.description: FIFA is pushing a plan to stage its showcase tournament every two years instead of every four years, but the proposal has been widely criticised by football officials in both Europe and South America.
articles.content:
FIFA is pushing a plan to stage its showcase tournament every two years instead of every four years, but the proposal has been widely criticised by football officials in both Europe and South America.

articles.description: Aston Villa duo Emiliano Martinez and Douglas Luiz are unlikely to play against Wolves due to their late return from international duty
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina coach Scaloni supports biennial World Cup proposal
articles.description: Read more about Argentina coach Scaloni supports biennial World Cup proposal on Devdiscourse
articles.content:
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni is in support of having biennial World Cups, saying it would benefit South American teams by cutting down on lengthy qualifying campaigns.
